text: Mark Anthony Patrick Owen (born 27 January 1972) is an English singer and songwriter. He is best known for being a member of pop group and band Take That; as of 2019, the group have sold 14 million albums and 11.4 million singles in the UK. Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Lancashire Category:Take That members
title: Mark Owen
